page.title: 08EDUCATION, West Cambs.
page.content:
Most children used to attend Village School to age 11, then to different secondary schools by selection/choice. Schools - Catworth closed 1971, now Village Hall; Leighton Bromswold now private house; Brington new 1970, opened by Duchess of Gloucester, takes from Bythorn, Catworth, Molesworth, Leighton Bromswold. Playgroup started at Catworth (hence "St Leonards") moved to own building at Brington 1984
Most 11+ children taken by bus to Hin- chingbrooke School, Huntingdon. Others to independent schools eg Kimbolton. Further education - Huntingdon Techni- cal College (renamed Huntingdonshire College), Bedford, Peterborough, North ampton. Some evening classes Brington eg Pottery, Keep Fit, Art.
